column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Yawningway needs help gathering the Carrotorium's Loporrits for mealtime.
With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, enter “carrot of happiness” to call over the Loporrits.
Speak with Yawningway.
Oh, bother...<yawn> There's no sign of any of them, and it's almost time to eat.
Mmm, you there... If you happen to be heading to the Carrotorium, could you let my fellows know it's mealtime? If we don't eat, I can't take my nap...
Many thanks...<yawn> They should come running at the mention of carrots of happiness, so just say those three magic words and they'll be on their way.
My friends aren't wont to refuse a well-prepared carrot─especially when it's a carrot of happiness. The mere mention should have them hopping back here in no time...
carrot of happiness

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the words “carrot of happiness” to call out to the Loporrit.
Take the square root of the roots and you get...
Carrots of happiness, you say? My, is it that time already?
I was working out projections for optimal carrot production based on the total population of Etheirys to ensure that─ Oh, never mind. I must make haste, or I'll miss out on seconds!
Oh my whiskers, a visitor from Etheirys! What do I do? What do I say? ...And have you brought any snacks?
Could that mean... Yes, it must be time to eat at last!
Oh, how I have waited for this moment! There's nothing like a carrot of happiness to fill the void in one's belly and soul...
O carrot, my carrot, the prize we sought is won...
Wh-Wh-Whaaat!? They're serving carrots of happiness today?
The deep, luscious orange... That tempting, slender silhouette... Wait for me, my darlings─I'm coming for you!
Ah, you've returned...<yawn> And everyone else is accounted for. Sustenance is essential for us Loporrits...though I suppose people are the same.
In any case, we expend a lot of effort in raising a whole variety of carrots. Carrots of happiness are a new cultivar that are particularly...<yawn>...comforting, though.
Mmm...it seems almost silly to have our workers consume so many carrots just so that we can produce more carrots...
...But that's a problem that can be solved with even more carrots!
No need to worry about the details─I'll work out the figures just as soon as...<yawn>... Hmm, what were we talking about?
